details.sectionContent: This workshop will teach you to build your own drawing robot controlled by your smartphone.

We will first teach you to make a mobile application and then to make your own robot. We will connect the app with your robot and whatever you will draw on your mobile will be drawn by your robot on a paper

App controlled robot involves the operation of robot with the operations done from your smartphone. This workshop helps participants to understand the concept and use of arduino, accelerometer, and 1239d motor driver IC. You will first learn making your own Mobile application using ‘MIT app inventor’. Then you will be taught to make a robot with Bluetooth and then we will connect the robot with your smartphone using Bluetooth. A pencil will be set in the robot in such a way that what you draw on your phone will be drawn by the robot on paper.
